sentences.sContent: Her earlier work shows a lot of originality.
sentences.sCn: 她的早期作品显示出丰富的独创性。

sentences.sContent: A lot of his designs lack originality.
sentences.sCn: 他的很多设计都缺乏创意。

sentences.sContent: a young writer of great originality
sentences.sCn: 一位极富创意的年轻作家

synos.tran: 创意；独创性，创造力；原始；新奇

words.tran: 原始的；最初的；独创的；新颖的
有创作力的；有发明之才能的

trans.tranCn: 创意；独创性，创造力；原始；新奇
trans.tranOther: when something is completely new and different from anything that anyone has thought of before
